thread.title: Champion Teams With Beams for Cozy U.S. Heritage-Themed Collaboration
thread.title_full: Champion Teams With Beams for Cozy U.S. Heritage-Themed Collaboration

author: Marcus Cho
title: Champion Teams With Beams for Cozy U.S. Heritage-Themed Collaboration
text:
Visit the original post to see all 10 images from this gallery. 
If you’ve ever wanted to add a little bit of Japanese flair to your outfits , you’ll finally have your chance this month with the release of the new Beams x Champion collection.
Featuring a slew of loungewear-friendly silhouettes such as sweatshirts, T-shirts and cotton shorts, the collection’s most immediately noticeable theme is the maintenance of Champion’s classic aesthetic, and staying true to its roots in comfortable fabrics. On Beam’s side of the collaboration, you’ll find the pieces plastered with various Beams logos in the colors of the U.S. flag, further paying homage to Champion’s roots.
The full collection is available to shop today at MR PORTER , with two exclusive styles in the sweatshorts and black jersey sweatshirt being available on the site only.
